string.text: Repair cost for your weapon in the first slot:
Repair cost for your weapon in the second slot:
Repair cost for your armor:
So, is my weapon ready?

Your weapon? What weapon?... 

 Aaa.. this weapon... Ok, ok, do not frown, I'm just kidding. 
 Here you are. You can "work" with this again.
Sidorovich, do you repair weapons and armor?

Ahh, but of course! How do you like the rifle in the vise? It's an excellent piece of work. So, what do you want to repair? I warn you - it's not cheap. The more it's damaged the more it will cost you.\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Repair the armor.
Damn, I'm out of cash. I'll come back later.
Wait, I'll get to it in a moment...\n Ready!!!
Ehh! Marked One, I see that you have had some serious scraps... I know I have some armor plates around here somewhere... Ahh! There they are...\n Ok! Here is it, like new!
Excellent. How did you get so skilled at repairing things? \n Ok, see you later.
The work of a true master. I have spent my money well. Thanks, bye.
Can you repair something else?
Ok, let me see.\n \nRepair list:
Okay, I'll take the money for the first weapon.
Okay, I'll take the money for the second weapon.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in an hour.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in two hours.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in three hours or so.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in five hours or so.
Good, thank you. I'll return to work, talk to me later.
Fine... All is better than nothing, isn't it? \n Here you are.
So, at least you'll learn something from this... \n Here you are.
Barman, can you repair some of my gear?

Honestly, I can't. But in the kitchen I have one Stalker who works for me to pay off his bar tab. He's a great weapon smith. He can repair anything you bring him. So, what do you want to repair?\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Fix my body armor.
It looks like I don't have enough money. Maybe next time.
Take it. It's fixed and ready to go!
It's done. It looks like he did a great job!
Ahh! it looks like new! Your weapon smith is indeed a master! Give him my regards.
Indeed, excellent work!
Can he repair something else?
Of course, he doesn't have a lot to do at the moment.\n \nRepair list:
Okay, I'll take the money for the first weapon.
Okay, I'll take the money for the second weapon.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in an hour.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in two hours.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in three hours or so.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in five hours or so.
Good, thank you. I'll return to work, talk to me later.
Fine... All is better than nothing, isn't it? \n Here you are.
So, at least you'll learn something from this... \n Here you are.
Could you repair my gear?
Yes, I could use a little break from my research. But i don't have all the tools I need, and repairing is just a hobby for me, so don't expect it to be cheap.\n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Fix my body armor.
Oh no, I'm out of cash. Maybe next time.
Wait a minute...\n \nLooks like everything is done, it's all yours!
Plates for armours are difficult to find around here, but i have a few left in stock. Wait here please...\n \nThere we go. A fine job if I do say so myself.
Well done! You're the real deal. Thanks.
You should give up your research and open a repair shop! Excellent work, even if it was a bit expensive.
Could you repair something else?
If i hurry, I might finish before my research data becomes obsolete.\n \nRepair list:
Okay, I'll take the money for the first weapon.
Okay, I'll take the money for the second weapon.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in an hour.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in two hours.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in three hours or so.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in five hours or so.
Good, thank you. I'll return to work, talk to me later.
Fine... All is better than nothing, isn't it? \n Here you are.
So, at least you'll learn something from this... \n Here you are.
Sorry man, but I'm here to repair my gear... what are your fees? I've heard they're expensive.
Quality will cost you, but I'll leave you with at least one arm and one leg left. Ha ha! So, what do you wish to repair? The more damaged it is, the higher the price will be. \n \nRepair list:
Repair the weapon in the first slot.
Repair the weapon in the second slot.
Fix my body armor.
I don't have enough money... Let's do this another time.
I got most of the dings out and polished it up nice and shiny for you.\n \nTry to take a little better care of it next time!

Marked One, do you have the mark "Please shoot here" on you? I think you must, given all of these holes in your gear. Ok, give it to me, I will repair it.\n \nFor you only fresh armor-plates from the cupboard! And I also have covered the mark with one that says "Please stab here" ... Ehhh Come on! Don't give me that scared face... You know that I like to joke!...
As new! Excellent work!

What a kidder!Hmm... you have repaired the armour perfectly though. Nevertheless you might as well add those two plates that I see on the table for good measure! I like the floral pattern on that saucer particularly well.
Can you repair anything else?
Certainly, as long as you have the cash. I don't make loans to cover repair costs!\n \nRepair list:
Okay, I'll take the money for the first weapon.
Okay, I'll take the money for the second weapon.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in an hour.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in two hours.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in three hours or so.
When it's finished - I'll report you on your PDA. \n It should be ready in five hours or so.
Good, thank you. I'll return to work, talk to me later.
Fine... All is better than nothing, isn't it? \n Here you are.
So, at least you'll learn something from this... \n Here you are.
